repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: William Thaw Letter to Thomas A. Scott
did.abstract: Letter dated July 23, 1877, written by William Thaw to Thomas A. Scott, Philadelphia, giving information and describing conditions during the railroad riots.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183> kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Letter dated July 23, 1877, written by William Thaw to Thomas A. Scott, Philadelphia, giving information and describing conditions during the railroad riots. This file contains the original copy of Mr. Thaw's letter and typewritten copies.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: William Thaw Letter to Thomas A. Scott #5170m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Letter from William Thaw to Thomas A. Scott, Philadelphia, giving information and describing conditions during the railroad riots.
